name: Allada T-shirt Designer for Woocommerce – Custom Product Designer for T-shirt personalization and design
author: ORION

sections.description:
Text Tutorial

HOW TO CREATE A CUSTOM PRODUCT ON A WOOCOMMERCE STORE USING THE ALLADA PLUGIN

Live Demo

CUSTOMIZE YOUR OWN T-SHIRT

FREE VERSION FEATURES

  • Designed for Woocommerce powered custom T-shirt stores

    Allada, our custom t-shirt designer plugin for woocommerce, was specifically designed for custom t-shirt businesses only. Nothing more, nothing less.

  • Text – formatting feature

    Allada allows the customer to add text, change the color of the text, the font and the style. This feature as various help tools such as; align, move, resize, rotate, delete and lots more, helping your customers not to struggle during the design process.

  • Extensible fonts collection

    Fonts make a product designer. Allada comes with over 600 Google fonts perfect for t-shirt customization. In case you can’t find a particular font, you can simply add more to extend the default collection. True type (TTF) and Open type (OTF) font files are entirely supported.

  • Team orders

    Allada provides your customers the option to customize everything at once. They are able to edit names and numbers, in the front and back region of each team-mates jersey at the same instance and on the same page.

  • Save and re-edit design

    With our t-shirt customizer, customers are able to save their t-shirt designs on their account on your website if they are not done with their design or aren’t ready to buy.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • Woocommerce 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working

Automatic installation (easiest way)

To do an automatic install of Allada, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Allada” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download `allada-t-shirt-designer.zip`
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select `allada-t-shirt-designer.zip` from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download `allada-t-shirt-designer.zip`
  2. Extract the `allada-t-shirt-designer` directory to your computer
  3. Upload the `allada-t-shirt-designer.zip` directory to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.

Updating

You can use the automatic update feature of WordPress to update the plugin safely.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1 – February 18, 2022
-Change Tutorial link
-Fixed Bug related to Team configuration
-Change the tested up

Version 1.0 – December 30, 2021

1.1

short_description: A Custom T-shirt Designer that helps you set up your online custom t-shirt store with ease and efficiency.
